title: Leila`s Brothers
desc: As her brothers are having financial difficulties, Leila, who has dedicated her entire life to taking care of her family, devises a strategy.

title: Corner Office
desc: As Orson, The Authority's newest employee, finds himself trapped in the absurdities of corporate life, his alienation deepens when he discovers a room he's told doesn't exist

title: Meg 2: The Trench
desc: Dive into uncharted waters with Jason Statham and global action icon Wu Jing as they lead a daring research team on an exploratory dive into the deepest depths of the ocean. Pitted against colossal Megs and relentless environmental plunderers, our heroes must outrun, outsmart, and outswim their merciless predators in a pulse-pounding race against time.
